notes.reading-notes:
SAMPLE NOTES ON READING PASSAGE
TOPIC: sustainability (whether or not a system can function over time without using up necessary resources)
where the concept of sustainability is used:
very commonly in ecology
also in many other areas
notes.listening-notes:
SAMPLE NOTES ON LISTENING PASSAGE
TOPIC: situation that is example of sustainability
how this situation exemplifies sustainability:
two brothers each have a million dollars
brother A invests and lives only on interest (sustainable because he keeps all of the million dollars and can continue living this way)
brother B regularly spends part of the million dollars (not sustainable because the million dollars will all be spent and then he can't continue living this way)

check-list.item-text: I noted the main points of the reading passage.
I noted the main points of the listening passage.
I used careful planning to outline my response.
I began with an overall topic statement.
I used transitions to connect the supporting ideas.
